MetaData.MetaDataItem: Z-Wave Thermostat.Separate Heat and Cool Setpoints Up to 3 Stage Heat, 2 Stage Cool Remote control of most functions via Zwave Two part design or New 1 piece design Backlit LCD Wall Display Unit For standard gas/electric or heat pump HVAC systems Replaces existing 4 or more wire thermostats without the need for additional wiring (TZ16/TZ40) Optional Remote Temperature Sensor Power: 24VAC supplied from HVAC system Supports the ZWave thermostat device class

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/82/xml
